title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department taoiseach) order 2024

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach, 
with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 paul melia particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser hildegarde naughton minister state department taoiseach effect 9 april 2024

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 3. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach, 
with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

18 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [503] 3
